data.name: Command_Error
data.value: Invalid or missing parameters.

data.name: Command_Help
data.value: Available arguments: "-help" Show this part "-update <id> <content_path> [<previewImage_path> (Ignoring this item will not change the preview image)]" Update a mod "-newmod <title> <content_path> [<previewImage_path> (Ignore this will use default preview image)]" Create a new mod

data.name: Main_Message
data.value: Please enter your mod's workshop ID or URL to update your mod, or vaild operation: - "mymod" show your mods in a list - "newmod" create a new mod - "exit" exit - Only want to update the preview image? Attach "-updatePreviewOnly" after the ID or URL

data.name: Main_CreateFail
data.value: Failed to create mod:

data.value: Invalid input. Please try again.

data.name: Main_MultiInstances

data.name: Upload_ChoosePreviewImageFile_TaskDialog_Text_NewMod

data.name: Upload_ChoosePreviewImageFile_TaskDialog_Text_Update
data.value: Click "Yes" to select the image, or click "No" to skip without changing the image.
